Back to Johann Sebastian Bach

Johann Sebastian Bach

French Overture in C minor, BWV 831 (first version)

before c. 1733

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 33'

  • 1. Ouverture
  • 2. Courante
  • 3. Gavotte I – Gavotte II – Gavotte I
  • 4. Passepied I – Passepied II – Passepied I
  • 5. Sarabande
  • 6. Bourrée I – Bourrée II – Bourrée I
  • 7. Gigue
  • 8. Echo

Bach wrote the overture for a harpsichord with two manuals. The overture exists in a later version in B minor (BWV2,2a 831; BWV3 831.2).

Recommended editions

  • Neue Bach-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · V, 2 · BA 5048-01 · Zweiter Teil der Klavierübung / Vierter Teil der Klavierübung / Vierzehn Kanons · ed. Walter Emery / Christoph Wolff
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50186 · ed. Ulrich Leisinger

1. Ouverture

Duration: 12'

Difficulty: 3.5

2. Courante

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5

3. Gavotte I – Gavotte II – Gavotte I

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 2

4. Passepied I – Passepied II – Passepied I

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3

5. Sarabande

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 2.5

6. Bourrée I – Bourrée II – Bourrée I

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2

7. Gigue

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

8. Echo

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3.5
